meanings: (몸·물건 등을) hide, (formal) conceal, (formal) secrete; (덮어서) cover (up), veil, (literary) cloak; (가리다) screen (=감추다)
(사실 등을) hide, cover (up), (formal) conceal, keep (sth) secret[back], (formal) dissimulate (=감추다, 은폐하다)
(어떤 장소에) put, set, place, position, (informal) park (=놓다)
(일정한 상태로 있게 하다) keep, leave, let
leave and watch, wait and see
leave something and make soup out of it later

examples.korean: a stash of money 발음듣기 숨겨둔 돈 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
He discovered a huge cache of gold in the mountain. 발음듣기 그는 산에서 금을 숨겨둔 거대한 땅굴을 발견했다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: He discovered a huge cache of gold in the mountain. 발음

examples.korean: Some jewelry I had hidden deep in the armoire were stolen. 발음듣기 장롱 안에 꼭꼭 숨겨 둔 패물을 도난당했다 Neungyule
examples.english: Some jewelry I had hidden deep in the armoire were stolen. 발음

examples.korean: I think the suspect didn't say everything and keeps something dark. 발음듣기 내 생각에는 용의자가 전부 털어놓지 않고 무언가를 숨겨둔 것 같다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I think the suspect didn't say everything and keeps something dark. 발음

examples.korean: No one guarded the honesty box, but there was a hidden camera. 발음듣기 아무도 정직 상자를 지키지 않았지만, 숨겨둔 카메라가 있었다. Neungyule
examples.english: No one guarded the honesty box, but there was a hidden camera. 발음
